#How to write Controllers.
----
= How To =
  * Add a Uri to Server.conf like the following

        uri {
          path = "/name-of-the-page";
          service {
            type = "dynamic";
            handler = "/name-of-the-controller";
          }
        };

  * Register the handler in the Handlrer list in controllers.ml
     template_process "name-of-the-controller"
         ~bind_parameters:name_controller_params;
  
  * Define the controller in controllers.ml
  let name_controller_params (cgi:cgi_activation) =
    let param1 = get_variable_or_default cgi "param-name"   ~default:None in
    logic-of-the-controller
        -> ["result", var1; "something", var2 ]
  ;;

  *  The result of the controller should be a list of tuples

  * variables should be of type EXP(Numeric(Int)) or EXP(Numeric(Float)) or EXP(String()) or EXP(Boolean)or LIST or DICT
